title: octocat Profiler
description: Improved version of the octocat Profiler v1. In this new version, the application counts with server end points to fetch and process the data from the GitHub API and be more efficient. The new version also includes new graphs in D3.js.

title: devPortfolio
description: Online web portfolio where to describe some professional skills, experience, background, progress and showcase featured projects in the software development, web application and websites context.

title: archPortfolio
description: Online space dedicated to storing my architecture projects, experience and serve as a portfolio. It has been my first full web project and the one that aroused my interest and passion for web development.
